topComments.author: Ankur Panchbudhe
topComments.comment: One of the highest passes in the world where you can drive a car or a bike. When we reached here, there was no crowd, snowfall started and the whole place was misty and magical. There's a small cafe and shop here, we had yummy and steaming hot chocolate there. There's also an oxygen cafe, in case someone gets altitude sickness. From here, the road rapidly descends in both directions (Leh and Nubra). On the Nubra side, there are a few safe places where you can stop and play in the powder snow.

topComments.author: Sourabh Bishnoi
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Realmente me senti no topo do mundo. O passe motorizado mais alto do mundo. Sempre li sobre isso nos livros e ouvi das pessoas, mas o sentimento quando cheguei l√° n√£o pode ser explicado. Baixa press√£o do ar, tanto caos, todo mundo tentando tirar sua foto na frente do engarrafamento de uma milha de pedra. Mas a beleza c√™nica do alto desse desfiladeiro nunca foi imaginada tudo coberto de neve e fazia tanto frio ali. At√© o banheiro foi projetado assim que quando voc√™ faz xixi voc√™ tem uma bela vista de outras montanhas cobertas de neve. Havia v√°rios caf√©s e lojas de souvenirs tamb√©m de onde voc√™ pode comprar.  (Original) Really felt on top of the world. Highest motorable pass in the world. Always read about this in the books and heard from the people but the feeling when I reached there can't be explained. Low air pressure so much chaos everyone trying to get their photo in front of mile stone long traffic jam. But the scenic beauty from top of this pass was never imagined everything covered in snow and it was so cold there. Even washroom was designed like this that when you pee you get a beautiful view of other snow covered mountains. There were sevral cafe and souvenir shop too from where you can buy.

topComments.author: Prasenjit paul
topComments.comment: This place was a height of 17982ft and very cold place and shortage of oxygen and one must carry oxygen cylinder and due to high altitude people can get sickness as well. But amazing experience.

topComments.author: Tridip Chakraborty
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Khardung La est√° situado a uma altitude de 5.359 metros. √â aclamado como o passe motorizado mais alto em todo o mundo.  Khardung La est√° localizado a 39,7 km de Leh por estrada. N√£o tem aeroporto, ent√£o voc√™ ter√° que pegar um voo para leh e de l√° voc√™ pode pegar um t√°xi para chegar a Khardung La Pass. Aqui est√£o algumas outras op√ß√µes para chegar a Khardung La Pass de Leh.  √â altamente recomend√°vel pegar um t√°xi ou bicicleta para chegar a Khardung La de Leh. De carro, os viajantes chegar√£o ao destino em 1 hora e 23 minutos. Se voc√™ for de bicicleta, chegar√° ao passe em 1 hora e 15 minutos.  O servi√ßo de √¥nibus est√° dispon√≠vel diariamente de Leh para Nubra Valley, que passa por Khardung La Pass.  Mar√ßo-maio ‚Äã‚Äãe setembro-outubro s√£o os melhores para visitar o Mountain Pass.  Os n√≠veis de oxig√™nio e press√£o do ar s√£o extremamente baixos em Khardung La Pass. Correr ou se entregar a atividades extenuantes pode levar a doen√ßas ou n√°useas, portanto, tome precau√ß√µes para isso.  Apenas conex√µes p√≥s-pagas s√£o funcionais na regi√£o. BSNL e MTNL s√£o os √∫nicos provedores de rede que funcionam melhor aqui  (Original) Khardung La is situated at an elevation of 5,359 meters. It is hailed to be the highest motorable pass all across the globe.  Khardung La is located 39.7 Kms from Leh by road. It does not have an airport so you‚Äôll have to take a flight to leh and from there you can board a taxi to reach Khardung La Pass. Here are few other options to reach Khardung La Pass From Leh.  It is highly advisable to take a taxi or bike in order to reach Khardung La from Leh. By car, Travellers will reach the destination within 1 hour and 23 minutes. If you take a bike, you will reach the pass within 1 hour and 15 minutes.  Bus service is available daily from Leh to Nubra Valley which passes through Khardung La Pass.  March-May and September -October are the best to visit the Mountain Pass.  Oxygen and air pressure Levels are extremely low at Khardung La Pass. Running around or indulging in strenuous activities can lead to sickness or nausea so take precautions for that.  Only postpaid connections are functional in the region. BSNL and MTNL are the only network providers that work the best here

topComments.author: Yogita Uchil
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um √≠ndio orgulhoso por alcan√ßar a estrada motorizada mais alta do mundo. √â lindo no topo e √© um sonho realizado realiz√°-lo. Mas esteja ciente de que ele vem com seus pr√≥prios desafios. A doen√ßa da altitude √© real, por favor, aclimate-se antes de subir o pico. N√£o tenha pressa para visitar este ponto assim que chegar a Leh, d√™ tempo ao seu corpo para lidar com a altitude e mantenha sua mente e corpo fortes. A estrada para a passagem √© linda, tentamos capturar cada momento.  (Original) A proud Indian to reach the highest motorable road in the world. It is beautiful on top and it is a dream come true to achieve it. But be aware it comes with its own challenges. The altitude sickness is for real, please acclimatize before you climb the peak. Don't be in a hurry to visit this point as soon as you reach Leh, give your body time to handle the altitude and keep your mind and body strong. The road to the pass is beautiful we tried to capture every moment.

topComments.author: Gurjyot Gahir
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Famosamente conhecida como a porta de entrada para os vales Nubra e Shyok na regi√£o de Ladakh de Jammu e Caxemira. √â o passe motoriz√°vel mais alto do mundo. Ele est√° cheio de turistas saindo de Leh e parando o tempo suficiente para clicar em algumas fotos. Motociclistas de aventura de todas as partes do nosso pa√≠s e de todo o mundo visitam este desfiladeiro em suas motocicletas para uma experi√™ncia de aventura. Khardung La Pass est√° posicionado na cordilheira de Ladakh, que fica a 40 km de Leh, a uma altitude de 18.379 p√©s (5602 m).  (Original) Famously known as the gateway to the Nubra and Shyok Valleys in the Ladakh region of Jammu and Kashmir. It is the highest motorable pass in the world. It is filled with tourists crossing over from Leh and stopping long enough to click some photographs. Adventure bikers from all parts of our country and across the world visit this mountain pass on their motorcycles for an adventure soaked experience. Khardung La Pass is positioned on the Ladakh range, which is 40 km from Leh, at an altitude of 18,379 ft (5602 m).

(Original) Amazing experience! In peak rush season months (May-Oct) u will have to wait in que to get a photograph but in peak winters there is no one! Temperature reaches upto -24 in winter!

topComments.author: Tanuja Khatavkar
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O passe Khardungla √© um dos passes altos em Ladakh. O lugar mais visitado pelos turistas. Na verdade, as pessoas se aglomeram no local onde a altura de Khardungla √© mencionada. Isso resulta em engarrafamento. √â melhor que as pessoas entendam isso e cambaleem em diferentes pontos de Khardungla e continuem com suas sess√µes de fotos. Observa-se que, uma vez que est√° a uma altura excessiva, aproximadamente 18.000 p√©s acima do MSL, a maioria dos pap√©is experimenta n√°utica, v√¥mito, s√≠ndrome de doen√ßa de altitude etc. Portanto, tome rem√©dios antes de viajar para as alturas.  (Original) Khardungla pass is one of the high passes in Ladakh. The most visited place by tourists.Actually people crowd at the spot where the height of Khardungla is mentioned. This results into traffic jam. It is better if people understand this and stagger at different points on Khardungla and continue with their photo shoots. It is observed that, since this is at too much height approx 18,000 ft above MSL, most paper experience nautia, vommitting,altitude sickness syndrome etc. So do take medicine prior to travelling to heights.

topComments.author: Salasar Dham

topComments.author: Pradeep Khatri
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o fique mais tempo no topo, o tempo sugerido √© de 10 a 15 minutos. Sen√£o voc√™ vai come√ßar a ter dores de cabe√ßa  Est√°vamos viajando de Leh para Nubra Valley (Hunder) e temos que passar pelo passe Khardung La para chegar ao destino.  Demorou 2,5 horas para cobrir 35-40 km de Leh at√© o topo de Khardung La.  A apenas 4-5 km do topo de Khardung La, havia um trecho de 500-750 metros de estrada que tinha gelo congelado e era dif√≠cil para carros e bicicletas atravessarem, isso foi em 8 de maio de 2022.  (Original) Don‚Äôt stay for more time at the top, suggested time is around 10-15 minutes. Else you will start getting headaches  We were traveling from Leh to Nubra Valley (Hunder) and have to pass the Khardung La pass to reach destination.  It took 2.5 hours to cover 35-40 km from Leh till top of Khardung La.  Just 4-5 km from top of Khardung La, there was a patch of 500-750 meters road which has frozen ice and it was difficult for cars and bike to cross that, this was on May 8th 2022.
